title: WTF
body: HEY RIOT ME AND MY ADC DUO WERE PLAYING RANKED THEN I GOT DISCONNECTED, WHEN I REST CLIENT AND OPEN IT BACK UP, IT NEVER SIAD RECONNECT, WTF HAPPENED I THINK EVERYONE FROM THE GAME GOT DISCCONECTED

replies.body: Was this a Sona match?  It looks like the game might have crashed, so it went unfinished.  While it's super rare that this happens, you shouldn't be impacted by an losses or penalties.  Sorry that happened!
